definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: double, copy, second;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Ge 41:43 +; cstr. [[מִשְׁנֵה]] Je 16:18 + 3 t., so read also De 15:18 (van d. H., > [[נֶה]]- Gi), Je 17:18 (Gie Buhl al.); sf. [[מִשְׁנֵהוּ]] 1Sa 8:2 +; pl. [[מִשְׁנִים]] 1Ch 15:18 (1Sa 15:9, Ezr 1:10 v. infr.);—

(the) double: ´[[כֶּסֶף מ]]: Ge 43:12 (J) money of double amount, cf. [[כֶּסֶף]] ´[[מ]]: v:Ge 43:15 (J), a double amount (in) money (Ges:§ 131 q); ´[[לֶחֶם מ]]: Ex 16:22 (P); [[עַל אֲשֶׁר]]´[[מ]]: ´[[וגו]]: v:Ex 16:5 (P) the double above what they gathered daily; [[מִשְׁנֵה שְׂכַר שָׂכִיר]] De 15:18 (v. Dr); [[עֲוֹנׇם]] ´[[מ]]: Je 16:18 the double of their guilt, Je 17:18 (v. supr.); a double portion Is 61:7, Is 61:7, Zec 9:12, Job 42:10.
written copy of law De 17:18, Jos 8:32 (D).

definitions.title: : a.
definitions.body: second, rank, ´[[מִרְכֶּבֶת הַמּ]]: Ge 41:43 (J), ´[[רֶכֶב הַמּ]]: 2Ch 35:24; of pers. one second in rank, priest next to high-priest, ´[[מ]]:([[הַ]]) 2Ki 23:4, 2Ki 25:18 = Je 52:24; ´[[אֶהְיֶה־לְּךָ לְמ]]: 1Sa 23:17, [[מִשְׁנֵה הַמֶּלֶךְ]] 2Ch 28:7, [[לַמֶּלֶךְ]] ´[[מ]]: Es 10:3; 1Ch 15:18, 1Ch 16:5, 2Ch 31:12; [[מֵאֶחָיו]] ´[[מ]]: Ne 11:17.—1Sa 15:9 read (cf. SyrVer Targum) [[הַמַּשְׁמַנִּים]] (Ne 8:10) Th, [[הַשְּׁמַנִּים]] or [[הַשְּׁמֵנִים]] We Dr Bu, etc. (Ez Eze 34:16); ´[[מִשׁ]]: Ezr 1:10 is appar. corruption of a numeral.
second quarter, district, of city, [[הַמִּשְׁנֶה]] 2Ki 22:14 = 2Ch 34:22, Zep 1:10, cf. [[הָעִיר מִשְׁנֶה]] Ne 11:9 over the city, viz. the second quarter.
